mapper.select: SELECT id, userId, productId, createTime, isDel FROM easybuy_concern WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT c.id AS id, c.createTime AS createTime, c.isDel AS isDel, p.`name`, description, price, stock, categoryLevelId, filePath, b.`name` AS brandName FROM easybuy_concern c, easybuy_product p, easybuy_file f, easybuy_brand b WHERE c.productId = p.id AND p.brandId = b.id AND f.id = p.fileId AND c.userId = #{userId} AND c.isDel = 0 ORDER BY p.createTime
mapper.insert: insert into easybuy_concern(userid, productid, createtime) values (#{userId},#{productId},now())
